headline: Is PNC Financial Services (PNC) Attractive After Recent Share Price Pullback?
summary: If you are wondering whether PNC Financial Services Group is attractively priced right now, the starting point is understanding how its current share price lines up against a few core valuation checks. The stock closed at US$229.32 most recently, after a 4.6% decline over the last 7 days, while its returns sit at 2.8% over 30 days, 8.4% year to date, 20.9% over 1 year, 66.3% over 3 years and 58.7% over 5 years. Recent market attention on large US banks has focused on how they are positioned...
